statement.p: In 36.36 of the last 33 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{33}}={0.3636}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{33}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3636}\cdot{33}={11.9988}. We round that as requested to 12 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
